en_title: Department of Justice signs legal exchange arrangements with China University of Political Science and Law (with photos)
zh_title: 律政司與中國政法大學簽署法律交流安排（附圖）

en: The Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, today (December 8) attended the signing ceremony of legal exchange and co-operation arrangements between the Department of Justice (DoJ) and the China University of Political Science and Law in Beijing to strengthen mutual legal information exchange.

Mr Yuen said the co-operation arrangements will build a good platform for the two sides to strengthen exchanges and co-operation on issues of mutual concern in the future, including international arbitration, mediation and the Belt and Road Initiative.

"The Department of Justice has all along attached importance to exchanges and co-operation with universities. I am glad that we have reached consensus with the China University of Political Science and Law on further enhancing and promoting the legal exchanges and co-operation between the Mainland and the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region," he said.

In the morning, Mr Yuen attended the annual high-level working meeting with the Department of Treaty and Law of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and met with the Vice Minister of Foreign Affairs, Mr Liu Zhenmin, and the Director-General of the Department of Treaty and Law, Mr Xu Hong, to exchange views on issues of mutual concern. Also attending the meetings was the DoJ Law Officer (International Law), Mr Paul Tsang.
Mr Yuen will return to Hong Kong tomorrow afternoon.
zh: 律政司司長袁國強資深大律師今日（十二月八日）在北京出席律政司與中國政法大學法律交流和合作安排的簽署儀式，加強雙方的法律信息交流和互動。
袁國強表示，合作安排構建良好平台，促進律政司和中國政法大學日後就共同關心的議題加強交流合作，包括國際仲裁、調解和「一帶一路」發展策略等相關法律議題。
他說：「律政司一直十分重視與大學的交流和合作。我很高興與中國政法大學共同就進一步加強和推動內地與香港特區的法律交流和合作，達成了共識。」
今早，他出席外交部條約法律司的周年高層工作會議，並與外交部副部長劉振民及條約法律司司長徐宏會面，就雙方關注的議題交流意見。同時出席會議和會面的包括律政司國際法律專員曾強。
